verses.verse: Awake, <S%H5782><s%> <S%H5782>awake;<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> thy <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into thee the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

Shake <S%H5287>thyself<s%> from the <S%H4480>dust;<s%> <S%H6083><s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and sit <S%H3427>down,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> loose <S%H6605>thyself<s%> from the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of thy <S%H6677>neck,<s%> O <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Ye have sold <S%H4376>yourselves<s%> for <S%H2600>naught;<s%> and ye shall be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7223>formerly<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> them without <S%H657>cause.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6311>here,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> is taken <S%H3947>away<s%> for <S%H2600>naught?<s%> they that rule <S%H4910>over<s%> them make them to <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H5006>blasphemed.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> they shall know in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H1931>he<s%> that doth <S%H1696>speak:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is I.

How <S%H4100><s%> <S%H4998>beautiful<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings,<s%> that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of <S%H2896>good,<s%> that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> that <S%H559>saith<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> Thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth!<s%>

Thy <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice;<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall they <S%H7442>sing:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Break forth into <S%H6476>joy,<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> ye waste <S%H2723>places<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> he hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath made <S%H2834>bare<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Depart <S%H5493><s%> ye, <S%H5493>depart<s%> ye, go ye <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing; go ye <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of her; be ye <S%H1305>clean,<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H2649>haste,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> by <S%H4499>flight:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be your <S%H622>rearward.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall deal <S%H7919>prudently,<s%> he shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> and <S%H5375>extolled,<s%> and be very <S%H1361>high.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thee; his <S%H4758>visage<s%> was <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H4893>marred<s%> more than any <S%H4480>man,<s%> <S%H376><s%> and his <S%H8389>form<s%> more than the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of men: <S%H120><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H5608>told<s%> them shall they <S%H7200>see;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> shall they <S%H995>consider.<s%>
